name: 2025 11th International Conference on Computing and Artificial Intelligence
content: Publication: 1\. ICCAI 2025 Conference Proceedings, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, reviewed by CPCI. 2\. Journal of Advances in Information Technology (ISSN: 1798-2340; CiteScore: 4.2, IF: 0.9), indexed by ESCI (Web of Science), Scopus, EBSCO, Google Scholar, CNKI, Crossref, etc. 3.International Journal of Computer Theory and Engineering (IJCTE, ISSN: 1793-8201), indexed by EI (INSPEC, IET), Scopus, Index Copernicus, Google Scholar, CNKI, Crossref, ProQuest, EBSCO, etc.
